something_went_wrong: Something went wrong, try again later.

object-list.title: My Courses & Groups
object-list.offline: Your device is offline. You can pull to refresh or go to your favorites.
object-list.no_items: Favorites appear here and are downloaded. Favorites are offline available even without an Internet connection

page-layout.group: Additional information available for this group.
page-layout.course: Additional information available for this course.
page-layout.folder: Additional information available for this folder.
page-layout.default: Additional information available for this object.

settings.title: Settings
settings.downloadSize: Max. size of files for download (MB)
settings.delete_user_local_data_text: Are you sure you want to delete all local files on the device for this user?
settings.delete_all_files: Delete all local files on device
settings.delete_all_files_text: Are you sure you want to delete all local of all users on this device?

info.title: Info
info.instructions1: If you're on the Home page 'My Courses and Groups' you can mark the courses and groups as 'available Offline'. They are marked with a gray cloud. Once the files are synced, the cloud turns blue.
info.instructions2: The synchronization will start automatically each time the app is started or if a course has been marked as Available Offline. Manual synchronization can also be started by dragging (Pull to Refresh) the 'My Courses and Groups' page.

download.title: Download
download.something_went_wrong: Something went wrong! Try again soon.

actions.download_and_open_in_external_app: Download and Open with external app
actions.sync_incomplete: Something went wrong: The synchronisation is incomplete.
actions.offline_and_no_local_file: You are offline and no local file is available.
actions.download_without_wlan_continue: You are currently not connected to a WLAN. Do you want to download anyway?
actions.download_without_disk_quota_text: If you download this file, you will exceed the disk space specified in the settings. Do you want to download anyway?
actions.remove_local_files_in_text: Are you sure you want to delete all downloaded files?
actions.cant_open_file: There's no application that could open this filetype.
actions.file_error: There was a problem handling the file.
actions.server_not_reachable: We cannot reach the server, please try again later or try logging in again.
actions.server_response_validation_error: Server communication issue, please make sure to run the latest app and try again. Try login out and log in again-

details.potentially_used_disk_space: Estimated disk space usage after synchronisation

sync.sync_already_running: A synchronization is already in progress.
sync.title: Synchronization
sync.sync_incomplete: Something went wrong: The synchronization may be incomplete.
sync.stopped_no_wlan: New or updated files cannot be synchronized. Please connect to a WLAN
sync.files_too_big: New or updated files cannot be synchronized, they exceed the max. Quota. Please increase the quota in the settings or delete some files.
sync.sync_finished_text: The synchronization terminated. There are a total of {{totalItems}} marked files. {{updated}} files have been downloaded to the newest version. {{uptodate}} files are still up to date and don't need to be downloaded.
sync.some_files_were_too_big: Some files were too big. Increase the max. file size in the settings or download the files manually.
sync.no_more_space: The disk space exceeded and some files couldn't be downloaded. Delete some files or increase the disk space available to the synchronization in the settings.
sync.open_downloads_text_sng: The download of this favorite failed because the app was closed:
sync.open_downloads_text_plr: The download of these NUM favorites failed because the app was closed:

login.title: Login
login.offline_content: In order to login, your device needs to be connected to the Internet.

map.no_map: This learnplace does not have a map
map.too_far_away: You are too far away from the learnplace, to view the map

text.too_far_away: You are too far away from the learnplace to read this text

picture.too_far_away: You are too far away from the learnplace to view this picture

link.too_far_away: You are too far away from the learnplace to click on this link
link.no_access: You don't have the access rights to this link

video.too_far_away: You are too far away from the learnplace to play this video

accordion.too_far_away: You are too far away from the learnplace to view this accordion

fallback.browser: You are leaving the ILIAS App
fallback.synchronization_subtitle: Please wait a few seconds while we synchronize your ILIAS-account.

generic.loading_subtitle: Hang on a minute. It may take some time to download the content.

learnplace.loading_subtitle: Hang on a minute. If the learnplace contains a lot of content, it may take some time to download.

learningmodule.loading_subtitle: Hang on a minute. If the learning module contains a lot of content, it may take some time to download.

onboarding.title1: With the help of this app you can:
onboarding.function1: access your ILIAS courses on your smartphone.
onboarding.function2: make your courses & files available offline.
onboarding.function3: log in once and stay logged in.
onboarding.concept1: The Pegasus app connects you to the ILIAS installation of your institution, university or school.
onboarding.concept2: If your institution did not join yet, contact us
onboarding.datasecurity1: Your data will only be stored on your device. The app does not collect any personal information. If you want to check this in detail, you will find here the
onboarding.datasecurity3: ILIAS Pegasus is an open source project. If you want to see for yourself what the app does, then you can see the code here:
